page.title: 06NEWHAVEN TOWN'S PROSPERITY
page.content: There are 4 banks, Lloyds, Midland, Nat. West and Barclays, and 3 building societies, Leeds Permanent, Woolwich and Nationwide. The town obtains money from the cargo boat fees and this prosperity is growing. Types of cargo include citrus fruit, grapes, potatoes, tomatoes, oranges, meat. Unfortunately more businesses have closed down in recent years than have opened. When Vacco, Fergusons and Shopper's Paradise closed many people lost jobs. The largest employer is Parker Pen Company. New businesses have opened on Denton Island, making VCRs and computer components. The area's prosperity depends on the harbour attracting cargo boats, the continuation of the Dieppe Ferry service, fishing, influx of new light industry and the success of the new shopping precinct.
